content:
Hi,
I'm looking for a solution to perform X12 to Fhir mapping.
Could you suggest something?
Maybe someone has done this before.
Saw some talks about claim mappings to X12, does anyone know how's it going? lately http://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=7877
We are still in the forming of the X12 to FHIR mapping. FM will have another conference call on this on Thursday July 13 at 4 EST using freeconferencecall.com access code fm4
